topic.title: Anyway to have a full blown reddit clone
topic.body: I think it would be a good idea to have a complete clone of reddit, working on ZeroNet

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: yup no spam control, this no bueno

3_1MxdAjWgnqwCaunGHmhY39tVR51qV3peJL.body: odd: we'll get back to sending my site money as test soon, it is not finished, but i should have something up shortly, to test the hypothesis. As far as profiting, the ideas are endless: gambling on sports events, playing any kind of game vs other another player for money, etc. like hendrix said selling goods, legal or otherwise.

1_1BGaNcH1UBqAdatPbT3YssmPRVdhepMNPW.body: seems to be working fine on openVPN

1_1N9vyd78w2N6174aLsw7FvCk5Lij3Bu33Y.body:
> [gp](#comment_2_1LVL5r7L5AwFk7waWmBwuVZ8Fcg9NDxakY): Reddit is already full of clowns, but I guess you mean "clone."

corrected ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

7_1MxdAjWgnqwCaunGHmhY39tVR51qV3peJL.body:
First things first, i love it so far!
Downvotes please. If not downvotes, i know this is really out there, but!!! since this all can run off bitcoins, maybe charge someone a quarter equivalent for their upvote, and gift someone a quarter equivalent for receiving upvoted comments.

2_1Hcc6FX8CaRnXcGC4EYZ4NjrR2yfxuUHW8.body: So it appears to be to be more complicated on Google Chrome, But just by clicking the link on Firefox works fine. Of course, like scrub said, first you need a Torrent Client
